name: Secrets of Alchaemia
description:
You have stumbled upon an old alchemy master's notebook. It seems to hold many a great secret about the world and it's forces, yet it also happens to be encrypted.

You must perform experiments and make new discoveries to attempt to crack the great secrets in this ancient textbook.

----------------------------------------

Third game of the Ludum Historica Project, based on the 19th Ludum Dare Jam theme "Discovery"
